articles.author: Jack Durschlag
articles.title: FAA proposes rule change to force identification of Colorado, Nebraska drones
articles.description: One day after three northeastern Colorado and a western Nebraska county became unwilling participants in a series of mysterious, nocturnal and unknown drone flights crisscrossing their skies, the Federal Aviation Administration is promoting a new rule requiri…
articles.content: One day after Colorado and western Nebraska counties reported a series of mysterious, nocturnal drone flights, the Federal Aviation Administration is promoting a rule change last week that requires most drones to be identifiable remotely, a report said Monday… [+2651 chars]

articles.author: Victor Garcia
articles.title: Trey Gowdy responds to Biden's subpoena flip-flop
articles.description: Former South Carolina Congressman Trey Gowdy appeared on "The Ingraham Angle" Monday and ripped former Vice President Joe Biden flip flopping on whether or not he would honor a subpoena to testify before the Senate impeachment trial.
articles.content:
Former South Carolina Congressman Trey Gowdy appeared on "The Ingraham Angle" Monday and ripped former Vice President Joe Biden for flip-flopping on whether or not he would honor a subpoena to testify before the Senate impeachment trial.
